item.title: Java
item.description: Getting started Hello.java 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 public class Hello { // main method public static void main(String[] args) { // Output: Hello, world! System.out.println("Hello, world!"); } } Compiling and running 1 2 3 $ javac Hello.java $ java Hello Hello, world! Variables 1 2 3 4 5 int num = 5; float floatNum = 5.99f; char letter = 'D'; boolean bool = true; String site = "quickref.
